profile.name: Thomas Gascoyne
profile.subtitle: Graduate Software Engineer
profile.description: I specialise in creating exceptional software experiences, from the inside out.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi I'm Thomas Gascoyne, a Graduate Computer Scientist from the University of Liverpool. I have a deep passion for full-stack software development and I am always looking to learn new skills and technologies.

jobs.title: Development QA Engineer
jobs.description: I worked as a Software Engineer Intern in the Gaming Tribe at Sky Betting & Gaming. I was responsible for developing new features for the Sky Vegas website, as well as fixing bugs and improving performance. I worked with a wide range of technologies, including React, Redux, Node.js, and AWS.

jobs.title: Software Developer Intern
jobs.description: I worked as a Software Developer Intern in the Gaming Tribe at Sky Betting & Gaming. I was responsible for developing new features for the Sky Vegas website, as well as fixing bugs and improving performance. I worked with a wide range of technologies, including React, Redux, Node.js, and AWS.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: Intrugued? Want to work together? I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges. Feel free to drop me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can!
